name: Oat Cosmetics - Skin Identical Ceramides from Oat
description: Oat Cosmetics specializes in oat-derived ingredients including skin-identical ceramides. Their ceramides have a chemical structure identical to human skin ceramides, making them exceptionally effective at replenishing and restoring the skin barrier. As a plant-derived alternative, oat ceramides offer a sustainable and vegan-friendly option for barrier repair formulations.
notes: Innovative plant-based ceramide supplier. Chemical structure identical to human skin ceramides ensures high efficacy. Excellent option for natural and vegan formulations. Oat-derived ingredients are gentle and suitable for sensitive skin.
